Ultra Magnus: So I'm not alone to think something's wrong, heh? That's
 goo=
d to know. We'll know soon enough.

He turned the last corner that lead to =
the compound and...

...saw that there was a roadblock. Right there. Too ne=
ar for him to
brake or avoid.

Ultra Magnus: Holy Mother of Primus! Jump Ve=
nomia!

He swerved, hoping she had gotten off, and crashed his right side
s=
traight into the roadblock.
